alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:28PM EDT until July 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Kent County in central Delaware... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 628 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dover Base Housing, or near Dover, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Camden, Bowers, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Rising Sun, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Fortesque, Port Norris, Magnolia, Little Creek, Kent Acres, Highland Acres, Riverview, Rodney Village and Woodside East. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
